name: Fountain (alomora)
description:
Fountain

Fountain is a 3D virtual interpretation of an Imagism poem I wrote for the purpose of this project.

Instructions:

Left mouse button - change camera angle.

Right mouse button - change time of day.

Attributions:

Sounds:

  • Fountain in the pond by dibko
  • (Day) Forest ambiance by GirlWithSoundRecorder
  • (Afternoon) Wind and dry leaves ambiance by Stek59
  • (Night) Wind and crickets ambiance by Leandros.Ntounis

Assets:

  • Tree model by Polytope Studio
  • Skybox materials by Key Mouse
